TEXT.BibTeX_citation: @misc{Wiki_tay_Adam_Arkin, title = Adam_Arkin, year = 2025, month = May, day = 5, note = {In Wikipedia [Atayal]}, url = {https://tay.wikipedia.org/wiki/Adam_Arkin} }

S.FORM: Adam Arkin kawas tay 1956, ryax sa tay 19 nqu tay 8, Adam Arkin, squliq na Bunge'. pinqbaqan nya Adam Arkin, kawas tmasuq mqwas biru sa Horace Greeley pqwsan biru seneng, Chappaqua, New York. qnxan nya Adam Arkin maki msqun ki Linda Arkin. Adam Arkin maki tay kawas 1999 msqun ki Phyllis Lyons, maki tay kawas 2013 t'alax. Adam Arkin maki tay kawas 2017 msqun ki Michelle Dunker, tehuk misuw qani. Matthew Arkin hiya' ga, sswe' ni Adam Arkin. mintzyuwaw nya t'aring sa kawas 1975, mtzyuwaw zyuwaw na Engi ru mqwas. cinkhulan sa knita' sa brbiru' Lists of actors

Adam Arkin kawas tay 1956, ryax sa tay 19 nqo tay 8, Adam Arkin, sqoliq na Bonge'. pinqbaqan nya Adam Arkin, kawas tmasoq mqwas biro sa Horace Greeley pqwsan biro seneng, Chappaqoa, New York. qnxan nya Adam Arkin maki msqon ki Linda Arkin. Adam Arkin maki tay kawas 1999 msqon ki Phyllis Lyons, maki tay kawas 2013 t'alax. Adam Arkin maki tay kawas 2017 msqon ki Michelle Donker, tehok misow qani. Matthew Arkin hiya' ga, sswe' ni Adam Arkin. mintzyowaw nya t'aring sa kawas 1975, mtzyowaw zyowaw na Engi ro mqwas. cinkholan sa knita' sa brbiro' Lists of actors
